title: Desync then can't reconnect. I swear i didn't rage quit.
body:
I was having a hard time in a game.  Then I suddenly desynced from the game. Couldn't buy items and the minions were standing still, but I (and my team) seemed to still be moving. But no attempting to reconnect popped up to tell me I had disconnected.

So I  to quit to attempted to reconnect to fix it.. but the game would not load back up. I was just stuck at "in game" next to my name in chat and a otherwise blank client

My internet appeared to still be working.... although it stopped working whille I was attempting to reconnect.... I turned my modem on and off again....still didn't work but my internet worked immediately after I closed the client.

Just want to say i didn't rage quit but the game didn't regester a disconnect so I am worried I am going to lose honor for this :(.

replies.body:
I believe you that you didn't rage quit!  If you received a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) as a result, just know that it's going to treat everyone equally regardless of intent.  :D  Even though your internet is working, it sounds like your network is specifically having issues reaching the game server.  

I highly recommend running through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this, and playing a custom game to troubleshoot.  Let me know if that clears things up!
